title: Christmas Skin for Kayn!
body: Anyone think that there should be a Christmas Skin for Kayn (like Candy Kayn if anyone gets it :P) e.g. His scythe could be a candy cane.

replies.body:
Im down for it tbh, but only if rhaast is a giant reindeer with his horns swapped for antlers.

And all his abilities leave behind snow and make bell jingling noises.
I would definitely like that as an idea as well. :P There are so many opportunities for that skin.
